content:
see GF#17636 this is also true for this profile http://build.fhir.org/lipidprofile.html

When the spreadsheet is parsed the multiple profiles in the tabs are given the same title. Is there any other way besides splitting the spreadsheet with multiple profiles (tabs) into individual spreadsheets (one per profile) to make the Title reflect the profile ?
refer the task to core tooling with group A, and I'll look at it as soon as I can
OK, I'll split vitals into separate spreadsheets for now.
